snippet: A suicide bomber struck a crowded wedding in northern Afghanistan on Saturday, killing at least 19 people, including Ahmad Khan Samangani, Afghan officials said.
abstract: Suicide bomber sets off explosives after wading into a crowd of dignitaries at a wedding in northern Afghanistan, killing at least 19 people, including a prominent Afghan lawmaker who was celebrating the marriage of his daughter; the lawmaker, Ahmad Khan Samangani, the likely target of Saturday’s bombing, was a leading member of Afghanistan’s Uzbek ethnic group.

byline.original: By ENAYAT NAJAFIZADA and MATTHEW ROSENBERG
byline.contributor: Enayat Najafizada reported from Aybak, and Matthew Rosenberg from Kabul, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber struck a crowded wedding in northern Afghanistan on Saturday, killing at least 19 people, including Ahmad Khan Samangani, Afghan officials said.

headline.seo: Prominent Lawmaker Among Bombing Victims at Wedding in Afghanistan
headline.main: Prominent Afghan Lawmaker Among Bombing Victims at Wedding
headline.print_headline: Lawmaker Among Dead at Afghan Wedding
